def_cn: （英国的）大学毕业生，学士学位获得者
def_en: In Britain, a graduate is a person who has successfully completed a degree at a university or college and has received a certificate that shows this.

def_cn: （美国的）高中（或学院、大学）毕业生
def_en: In the United States, a graduate is a student who has successfully completed a course at a high school, college, or university.
In Britain, when a student graduates from university, they have successfully completed a degree course.

def_cn: （美国）中学（或大学）毕业，授予…学位（或毕业文凭）
def_en: In the United States, when a student graduates, they complete their studies successfully and leave their school or university. You can also say that a school or university graduates a student or students.
If you graduate from one thing to another, you go from a less important job or position to a more important one.
